section.title: Image
section.p: See https://www.freedomboxfoundation.org/code/A copy of the binary image for several hardward platforms are currently avialble. Freedombox is based on Debian Linux so a wide variety of platforms are supported. The FreedomBox Development team provides images for the most popular platforms currently used by the members of the team.

Currently the FreedomBox development team supports:
VirtualBox (should work with other virtual machine hosts)
RaspberryPi
BeagleBone
DreamPlug Official Images: http://ftp.skolelinux.org/pub/freedombox/
Instructions for downloading and verifying images are avaliable.
